content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and provide assembly instructions for both structures.

Target Image Analysis:
The image shows two distinct structures:

Left Structure:
- 6 layers tall
- Made of cube-shaped blocks and rectangular blocks
- Base and top are green rectangular blocks
- Middle section has red, blue, red cubes with a yellow vertical block on the side

Right Structure:
- House-like shape with triangular roof
- Base has two blue cubes
- Middle section has red and blue cubes
- Green horizontal block in middle
- Yellow horizontal platform
- Orange triangular roof pieces

Assembly Instructions:

For Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7 (green horizontal block for base)
    Step2: Move block with index 4 (red cube)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
    Step4: Move block with index 4 (red cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 9 (yellow vertical block)
    Step6: Move block with index 7 (green horizontal block for top)
}

For Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (blue cube for left base)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (blue cube for right base)
    Step3: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal platform)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (red cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 7 (green horizontal block)
    Step7: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular roof piece)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular roof piece)
}

These instructions will recreate both structures exactly as shown in the target image, using the blocks from the dictionary in their exact orientations without any rotation.
